name: New Project (TheMiSta92)
description:
New Project is a 2D-platformer with visual changes, boss fights, lovely animations and of course self-made music and sound effects.

Your goal is to develop a game for game jam although you are starting with nothing.

Collect scripts to boost your gameplay.

How

Keys W A S D and Space or use your controller

Turn on your Sound!

Team

Michael Staudinger: Lead Developer

http://www.michael-staudinger.at/?lang=en

Antonia Haslinger: Design, Sound and Animation

https://www.igotit.eu/

Dieter Köberl: Jr. Developer

This was our first Ludum Dare and we really look forward to the next one! Thanks to everyone for this awesome experience!

Tools

Unity

Adobe Creative Cloud

Github & Fork

Beepbox
